name: lga_profilesdata2011
title: VIC DHHS - Local Government Area Profiles Data (LGA) 2011

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Australia (CC BY 3.0 AU)

keyword: community profile, health, well being, quality of life, demographic, population, employment, social,Victoria,Department of Health and Human Services
abstract:
The 2011 Local Government Area (LGA) profiles are produced annually to facilitate service planning and policy development by enabling access to a broad range of data about each LGA. Each profile includes over 220 variables from a wide range of data sources. The data spans the year of 2011 and is aggregated by LGA from the 2011 Australian Statistical Geography Standard (ASGS).

The profiles provide measures on a broad range of topics including population, diversity, disadvantage and social engagement, housing, transport and education, health status and service utilisation, child and family characteristics and service utilisation.

For more information, please visit the Victorian Government Data Portal.

Please note:
  • AURIN has spatialised the original data.

selectedAttributes.title: Local Government Area Code
selectedAttributes.description: Code of the local government area

selectedAttributes.name: lga_name
selectedAttributes.title: Local Government Area Name
selectedAttributes.description: Name of the local government area

selectedAttributes.name: number_of_hospitals_health
selectedAttributes.title: Number of hospitals/health services
selectedAttributes.description: The number of hospitals and health service campuses located within the LGA. Includes both public and private hospitals.

selectedAttributes.name: number_of_schools
selectedAttributes.title: Number of schools
selectedAttributes.description: The number of schools located in the LGA. This item includes government private and Catholic primary and secondary schools. It also includes schools for children with special needs.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_born_overseas
selectedAttributes.title: %Born overseas
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population who were born overseas.
